Dr. theol. '''Thomas Fornet-Ponse''' is a research assistant at the seminar of Fundamental Theology at the [[Wikipedia:University of Bonn|University of Bonn]]. Among his research interests are philosophical and theological analyses of J.R.R. Tolkien and other authors of fantasy works. He is a committee member of the [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V.|German Tolkien Society]] and is editor of the journal ''[[Hither Shore (journal)|Hither Shore]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.walking-tree.org/cormareBookInfo.php?number=9|articlename=Tolkien and Modernity 1|dated=23 October 2006|website=[http://www.walking-tree.org/ Walking Tree]|accessed=9 March 2013}}</ref>
